name: Snowball Tsunami
description:
Collect Hot Chocolates to stay warm and get a high score!

Use Arrow keys, space or up to jump. On mobile, use the arrows on the screen.

You may want to go full screen to make it easier to control.

Created for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam - rate our game and leave comments!

Game design: Isaac, age 7 and Asher, age 9.

Original Idea: Isaac.

Art: Isaac and Asher and Dylan, Google image search, and the art tools in Construct.

Music: Isaac and Asher, using Incredibox their iPad.

Sound Effects: Isaac and Asher, using their mouth, recorded with online-sound-recorder.com.

Asher and Isaac testing their work

"Code": Their dad, Dylan, using Construct 3.

Behind the scenes: How we prepared and participated in our first game jam!
